channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [BOOKKEEPER-657] Journal Improvement
item.description: separated force write thread, better group commit strategy on latency and throughput.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
generated a patch included twitter changes on journal.

  • provided a separated a force write thread to sync journal file rather than sync journal in journal thread.
  • provided different policy on how to sync journal based on the tradeoff between throughput and latency consideration.
sorry. the previous patch is wrong. attached the correct one.

add missing license header in BookieThread.

the test cases should be fixed after setJournalFlushWhenQueueEmpty to be true. It passes all test cases on my laptop.

Try submitting the patch again.
